acf.module_short_description: Understand the fundamental components of technical SEO.
acf.module_long_description: In this module, you will learn about the fundamental components of technical SEO. You will be able to ensure that Google can crawl your website correctly, understand how Google is able to customise search results before learning how to mark up your website with structured data.
acf.video_url: <iframe title="Module 9: Technical SEO | Free Advanced SEO Textbook Online 2020 | SUSO" width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/5qNJk28v5LU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
acf.content: In this module, you will learn about some of the core aspects of technical SEO. You will be able to ensure that Google is able to crawl your website correctly, understand how Google is able to display the correct SERP based on different types of queries and how search can be customised. Finally, we will explore the importance of structured data as well as look at how you can mark up your website to provide Google with as much information about your website as possible.
